00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/typelist/type_list.h"
00012 #include "hope/typelist/typelistsort.h"
00013 #include "hope/tuple/flat_tuple.h"
00014 
00022 namespace hope {
00023     namespace detail {
00024 
00025         template<typename... Ts, typename... Vs>
00026         constexpr auto make_flat_tuple_from_type_list(type_list<Ts...>, Vs&&... args) {
00027             return flat_tuple<Ts...>(std::forward<Vs>(args)...);
00028         }
00029     }
00030 
00039     template<typename... Ts>
00040     constexpr auto make_sorted_tuple(Ts&&... args) {
00041         constexpr auto typeList = sort(type_list<Ts...>{});
00042         return detail::make_flat_tuple_from_type_list(typeList, std::forward<Ts>(args)...);
00043     }
00044 }
